newsitem.title: UK: IMI Plc gains after results top forecasts.
newsitem.headline: IMI Plc gains after results top forecasts.

text.p: Shares in IMI Plc were indicated higher on Monday after the diversified engineering group reported annual profits above analysts best expectations. The shares were up 5p at 369p by 0819 GMT in pre-market trade. IMI announced pre-tax profits before exceptional items of 137.5 million stg, up 30 percent from 1995. An exceptional profit of 23.6 million stg further boosted profits. Analysts had been expecting profits in a range of 131-137 million stg and a dividend of 12.5p compared with 11.5p a year ago.
The company raised its total dividend to 13p.
IMI said each of its four businesses had done well to improve sales in an increasingly competitive environment in 1996 and added that its performance so far in 1997 had been satisfactory.
